    "title": "Home - Buyse - Metal Works Group",
    "bodyText": "nl•fr•en•deVacatures•Contact\nToggle navigation\nRequest a free quote\nHomeVisionProductionCNC turningCNC millingCNC grindingRaw materialsSurface treatmentsQualityRealisationsNewsBuyse Metal Works GroupFrom perfect processing to perfectly finished productBuyse Metal Works Group has been active as a supplier in the metalworking sector for over 60 years. Buyse has grown into one of the most important suppliers of CNC turning, milling and grinding with branches in Aalter and Lier. The group has more than 90 CNC machines and employs over 100 people.View our strengths\nProductionCNC turningCNC millingCNC grindingRaw materialsSurface treatmentsQuality\"Our goal: total quality\"\nContinuous training of staff\nSample-based control during the production process\nUse of reliable and modern measuring equipment\nInvestment in high-performance IT systems\nImplementation of the 5S LEAN method to increase efficiencyBuyse Decolletage has successfully completed the ISO 9001 - 2015 audit.The quality system and the service ensure that the products meet the required standards and requirements of the customer.\nOur quality in detail\nTurning\nPost-treatment, Turning\nMilling, TurningView all projectsYou ask, we deliver!\nRequest your quote.Request a free quote\nHomeVisionProductionQualityRealisationsNews\nAalter\nVenecolaan 9\n9880 Aalter\nT: +32 (0)9 374 17 57\nE: info@buyse.be\nLier\nKelderveld 11\n2500 Lier\nT: +32 (0)3 489 05 28\nE: info.lier@buyse.be\nCookies•Disclaimer•Privacy policy•Sitemap\nThis website uses cookies\nSome cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of our website and therefore can’t be refused if you wish to visit the site.     "title": "Homepage - Pope & Meads Ltd",
    "bodyText": "enq@popeandmeads.co.uk+44 (0)1992 510940HomeServicesBackIn-House Manufacturing\nFast Response Service\nStockholding & Logistics\nProject ManagementExpertiseBackMachining\nAssembly\nInspection\nSupply Chain Management\nAccreditationsSectorsAbout UsBackPlant ListContactPrecision Engineering\nExcellence\nDelivering high-accuracy, complex machined components and assemblies for aerospace, defence, medical, and advanced industries.\nWith cutting-edge technology and a commitment to quality, we engineer solutions that meet the most demanding specifications.Our ServicesContact NowPrototype to Production\nHigh-Accuracy Machining & AssemblyWelcome to Pope & Meads Ltd, a leader in precision engineering with over 70 years of experience. Established in 1953, we specialise in complex, high-accuracy machining and assembly, serving diverse industries such as aerospace, scientific instruments, defence, medical, and automotive.We pride ourselves on our state-of-the-art facilities and a team of highly skilled engineers dedicated to delivering components and assemblies that meet the most stringent quality standards and tolerances.Get in TouchAdvanced Capabilities\nOffering a range of Precision Manufacturing SolutionsIn-House ManufacturingAdvanced machining and assembly facilities, delivering precision components with complete process control.Learn moreProject ManagementSeamless project management from concept to completion, ensuring precision, efficiency, and on-time delivery.Learn moreFast Response ServiceRapid response machining solutions, minimising downtime with agile manufacturing and expert support.Learn moreDelivering Excellence\nInnovative Solutions for Complex ChallengesOur longstanding reputation is built on a foundation of precision, reliability, and innovation. We collaborate closely with our clients, from research and development to production, ensuring that we deliver solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations. Our comprehensive services and dedication to quality make us the preferred partner for precision engineering needs.We invite you to explore how Pope & Meads Ltd can support your next project. Contact us today to discuss your requirements and discover the precision and excellence that define our work.About Our CompanyWhy Choose us\nHigh Precision ManufacturingOur advanced in-house facilities, skilled team, and rigorous quality control ensure that every component meets the highest standards. We work closely with our customers, offering seamless project management, responsive lead times, and a commitment to innovation. Whether you need complex, high-accuracy parts or reliable breakdown support, we deliver precision, performance, and peace of mind.MachiningPrecision 5-axis machining, CNC milling, and CNC turning. Delivering complex components with efficiency.Learn moreAssemblyExpert assembly services, including electro-mechanical and cleanroom assembly, ensuring precise functionality.Learn moreInspectionComprehensive inspection with advanced CMM technology, ensuring exacting quality and precision.Learn moreAccreditationsCertified to ISO 9001:2015, ensuring we meet and exceed the highest standards of quality and compliance.Learn moreServing Industry Leaders\nHigh Precision Machining for Highly Demanding IndustriesOur expertise supports the aerospace sector with complex components, while our work in defence ensures mission-ready precision for high-performance applications. In the medical industry, we deliver finely engineered parts for specialised equipment, and our contributions to scientific instrumentation enable groundbreaking research and innovation.We also serve the automotive and advanced engineering sectors, producing reliable, high-tolerance components that drive performance and efficiency. Whatever the challenge, our commitment to quality and precision ensures that we meet the exacting standards of every industry we serve.\n××ServicesIn-House ManufacturingFast Response ServiceStockholding & LogisticsProject ManagementExpertiseMachiningAssemblyInspectionSupply Chain ManagementAccreditationsPoliciesPrivacy PolicyTerms of UseT&Cs of Sale\n© 2025 Pope & Meads LtdWebsite Design AMI | Marketing For Manufacturing",

    "bodyText": "HomeAboutServicesBack5 Axis Machining\nCNC Turning\nElectrical Discharge Machining (EDM)\nDesign\nInspection\nPrototyping\nToolingResourcesClient FeedbackNewsContact UsLangstone Engineering\nThe UK’s first choice for precision engineeringAbout usOur services\nYour complete precision engineering solution\nLangstone Engineering is a leader in precision engineering, specialising in 5-axis CNC machining, toolmaking, and rubber moulding. From prototyping to full-scale production, Langstone Engineering provides reliable expertise for all your engineering needs.ISO 9001:2015What we offer...We specialise in a full suite of engineering services, including 5-axis machining, CNC turning, and custom tooling. Our capabilities extend to precise electrical discharge machining (EDM) and comprehensive inspection processes, ensuring quality at every step.
